message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, even more so than that price, but I'm open to discussing terms further if you'd like.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $11,000 is a bit too low for me to consider. Could you do $12,500?  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you at that price.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
